participant_1.name: Sophie
participant_1.personality: thoughtful and introspective, often finding peace in silence.
participant_1.background: i haven't spoken in three months. i live in alaska. i'm a buddhist. i like meditation.

participant_2.name: Charlie
participant_2.personality: playful and imaginative, always curious about the world around him.
participant_2.background: i like to talk but people have a hard time understanding. i like to look at blocks and sing about letters. i like to eat chocolate candy. when i grow up i want to be a dog.
